title: FS: 1950's Yankee Stadium RPPC, 1945 Maple Leaf Gardens RPPC, Cincinnati Reds Photo

posts.post_title: FS: 1950's Yankee Stadium RPPC, 1945 Maple Leaf Gardens RPPC, Cincinnati Reds Photo
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,

I have the following items for sale:

• 1950's Yankee Stadium RPPC SOLD
• 1945 Maple Leaf Gardens RPPC $[STRIKE]75.00[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$60.00[/STRIKE] $50.00
• 1957 Cincinnati Reds Photograph Bobby Durnbaugh [STRIKE]$40.00[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$35.00[/STRIKE] $30.00

Shipping is $5.00 per card (tracking & insurance is extra). PM or post if interested and thanks for looking!
Jeff

Photo looks like Rocky Bridges. Cool Postcards!

Mike

Big drop in price on these items, let me know if you're interested. Can work on a better price if interested in all three. Thanks,
Jeff
Ill take yankee stadium postcard.  Will DM you

Hi Josh,
I replied to your PM. Thanks,

Josh,
